abstract: Unlike the cute and sweet images of dogs on social media, Marcos Javier Garcia’s photos show the lives of dogs that have been abandoned or given up to a Miami shelter where space is limited.
lead_paragraph: There are two kinds of Serious Dog Lovers: those who clamor to volunteer at county animal shelters, and those who cannot stomach them.
snippet: Unlike the cute and sweet images of dogs on social media, Marcos Javier Garcia’s photos show the lives of dogs that have been abandoned or given up to a Miami shelter where space is limited....
